cmp: 子 (11 p.m.-1 a.m./1st earthly branch/child/midnight/son/child/seed/egg/small thing, (noun suff.))
mng: (dialect) no good, (contraction of 不 and 好), see 孬種|孬种[nao1 zhong3]
bad (same as 壞|坏, informal abbr. of 不好, also pronounced [nāo]), dastard
